item.title: Experience Ritu Kumar's summer 2015 collection up close and personal
item.description: Source: Ritu Kumar website. High-end Indian fashion house Ritu Kumar has released its Summer 2015 Collection, available now at their flagship Dubai location in the BurJuman Shopping Centre. This collection features pieces from both the Ritu Kumar and Label Ritu Kumar lines. Designed for the modern woman, the Ritu Kumar Summer 2015 collection provides a variety of styles for day or evening wear, from kurtis to skirts and suits. The line incorporates fabrics like jersey, crepe, cotton georgette, and cotton voile.

item.title: Abu Dhabi International Airport has increased its summer flights by 18% compared to 2013
item.description: Abu Dhabi International Airport’s summer 2014 flight schedule is its busiest ever, featuring six new destinations and 71 additional weekly flights to India. Airport authorities reported an 18% increase in weekly flights compared to the previous summer, rising from 1,052 to 1,242, catering to both business and leisure travelers. New nonstop routes debuting this summer include flights from Abu Dhabi to Los Angeles, Zurich, Belgrade (Serbia), Perth, Jaipur, and Yerevan (Armenia).

item.title: Unique guest experiences offered by the Peninsula Academy
item.description: The Peninsula Hotels recently announced their Peninsula Academy Summer programs for this year. The luxury hotel group offers exclusive experiences focused on food, fashion, and art, perfect for corporate events or special clients. Source: Peninsula Hotels. Each program includes unique touches like bespoke Peninsula transportation, ranging from private helicopters and chauffeured Rolls-Royces to MINI Cooper S Clubman vehicles. Here are some highlights from their Asian properties: The Peninsula Hong Kong presents “Caviar Connoisseurship,” providing an in-depth look into the world of sustainably-farmed caviars, exploring their distinct qualities and ideal enjoyment methods.

item.title: Gulf Air reveals its summer 2018 schedule
item.description: Source: Gulf Air. Plane in Gulf Air livery. Bahrain’s national airline, Gulf Air, has launched its Summer 2018 schedule, increasing both flight frequency and passenger capacity to popular destinations for the peak travel season between mid-June and mid-September 2018. Flights to Amman, Jordan, will increase to three times daily, while flights to Beirut, Lebanon, will increase to twice daily. Istanbul, Turkey, a popular summer destination, will have 12 weekly flights during peak season, and flights to Baghdad, Iraq, will permanently increase to five times per week.

item.title: The Global Day of Discovery at Renaissance Hotels worldwide is celebrated on June 26th
item.description: Renaissance Hotels is hosting its third annual Global Day of Discovery on June 26th at over 150 locations. On this day, almost every hotel will offer guests and community members the opportunity to explore something new. These events, designed by hotel Navigators, include musical performances, culinary experiences, art displays, cultural activities, and unique local excursions. This day marks the start of the Renaissance Hotels’ Summer of Discovery calendar, a summer-long series of exclusive events at all 157 hotels worldwide.

item.title: Get away to The Meydan Hotel or Bab Al Shams Desert Resort & Spa this summer
item.description: Source: Meydan Hotels & Hospitality website. Meydan Hotels & Hospitality is offering a summer promotion called “The Great Escape” for AED 490 per night at both Bab Al Shams Desert Resort & Spa and The Meydan Hotel until September 30, 2015. This offer is well-suited for short business trips. Located a 45-minute drive from the city, Bab Al Shams Desert Resort & Spa provides an authentic desert experience amidst the sand dunes.
